text:
NEW YORK STATE EDUCATIONAL RADIO AND TELEVISION ASSOCIATION
Report of the Engineering Committee
April 5, 1963
The N.Y.S,E.R*T.A. Engineering Committee was organized to advise
educational organizations on technical matters relating to radio, open
circuit television, and CCTV. Currently this committee is conversant
on station inter-connection, signal relay, networking, facility and
test equipment recommendations, and technical aspects of applications.
The committee will be patterned after the NÂ«A0B, Committee and will
not go into competition with commercial consulting firms. A placement
service for technical personnel will not be a function of this Committee.
It is hoped that this committee will be of assistance to the other
N.Y.S.E.R.T.A. Committees.
